summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hippie Honey Scrub Exfoliant Facial Cleanser by Hippie Skin
Review Date: 2017/05/03
Store: Hippie Skin
Product Description: ['A gentle, invigorating cleanser that sloughs away dead skin, fights bacteria, and leaves skin soft and vibrant. Formulated with essential oils that support aging skin, this cleanser is a must have for a natural daily routine! SCENT: Lavender and honey, yum! INGREDIENT SUPERSTARS: Raw Honey - antioxidant, antibacterial and antiinflammatory properties support reduced scarring and promote skin regeneration. The natural sugar crystallization and glycolic acid contained in raw honey gently sloughs away dead skin cells, promoting cleaner, healthier skin. Lavender Essential Oil: Promotes skin healing, reduces redness and promotes blood circulation, which provides more oxygen and nutrients to the skin. Carrot Seed Essential Oil: Promotes skin health through antiseptic properties. Tightens pores and skin to combat sagging skin and fine lines. DIRECTIONS: Massage onto face with upward circular motions and rinse well with warm water. Recommended for all skin types.']
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Hippie Skin', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Dry, Normal', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 2.36 x 2.68 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '865233000117', 'Manufacturer': 'Hippie Skin'}
Review Text: The scrub has a creamy texture and smell strongly of honey.  It applies easily to the skin, and rinses off without effort.  My skin feels soft after use, and it has helped with my break-outs
Review Title: It applies easily to the skin
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Argan Oil Shampoo and Conditioner Set - Sulfate Free All Natural Hair Repair Treatment, Clarifying Volumizing & Moisturizing, Color Safe, Gentle for Curly & Color Treated Hair Gift Set (2x 8oz)
Review Date: 2017/05/14
Store: Premium Nature
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'Premium Nature', 'Hair Type': 'Curly,Damaged,All,Straight,Color Treated', 'Special Ingredients': 'Vitamin-e,Jojoba-oil,Almond-oil,Peach,Argan-oil,Camellia-oil'}
Review Text: I have been using this shampoo and conditioner set only briefly. Nevertheless, it smells pleasant, it didn't leave my hair tangled, or oily. It left my hair with a lot of body, and very soft. Of course, time will tell as to how my hair hold up in the long run. For the time being however… I am very  pleased.
Review Title: So far I am very satisfied.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Smooth Lavender Sugar Scrub
Review Date: 2017/10/20
Store: Lime and Lotus Organics
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Lime and Lotus Organics', 'Skin Type': 'Oily', 'Material Feature': 'Certified Organic', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Information': 'Jar', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.75 x 2.75 x 1.75 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '712038258284'}
Review Text: I'll admit when I first received this scrub I was disappointed.  It was a small container, and I thought it would be gone within a week.  It has been three weeks, and I barely made a dent!  The scent is lovely, the scrub is luxurious, and most importantly... it works!  My skin is smooth and blemish-free.  That is quite the achievement!
Review Title: A surprise
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Earth Chemistry Lavender Conditioner, Restore Shine, Eliminate Flyaways, Stop Split Ends & Breakage with 100% Plant Protein & 8 Essential Oils, Colorsafe, Made Fresh in California
Review Date: 2018/05/02
Store: EARTH CHEMISTRY SINCE 4.6 BILLION YEARS
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'EARTH CHEMISTRY SINCE 4.6 BILLION YEARS', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Damaged', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '8.00 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3 x 4 x 3 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '655711830660'}
Review Text: This is the perfect complanet to the volumizing shampoo.  A lovely subtle scent, a miraculous ability to untangle those tangles, and leaves my hair soft, light, and even bouncy!
Review Title: Thank you for giving us something that works!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Deluxe Castile Soap - Lemongrass - Made with Premium Oils - All Natural - Vegan - Biodegradable - For Hand, Body & Face - Handcrafted in Small Batches
Review Date: 2018/07/31
Store: Bali Secrets
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Bali Secrets', 'Scent': 'Lemongrass', 'Material Feature': 'Biodegradable Warning', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 1.97 x 6.89 inches; 9.91 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BALI-SOAP-LEMO'}
Review Text: This is my first time trying this product.  I like the scent which is gently reminiscent of lemongrass.  The pump is a wonderful feature.  This does clean well.  It also doesn't leave scum in the tub.  That makes me happy.  I certainly don't want to break my neck first thing in the morning.
Review Title: worth trying
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hair Food Kiwi & Mission Fig Volume Shampoo and Volume Conditioner Set
Review Date: 2019/08/29
Store: Hair Food
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Oil Free', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'Hair Food', 'Scent': 'Kiwi', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '9.45 x 7.28 x 5.98 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '037000822141'}
Review Text: I used this shampoo and conditioner this morning, and so far I am very happy.  My hair feels light, and clean.  I didn't discover any tangles, or frizz. The scent is perhaps a little too sweet for my taste, but I cannot argue with results!I absolutely love the pump for each bottle.  It is so much cleaner, and controlled.
Review Title: So far, so very good
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: HASK CACTUS WATER Weightless Moisture Shampoo + Conditioner Set for All Hair Types, Color Safe, Gluten-Free, Sulfate-Free, Paraben-Free, Cruelty-Free - 1 Shampoo and 1 Conditioner
Review Date: 2020/06/15
Store: HASK
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Color Safe,Moisturizing', 'Material Type Free': 'Alcohol free,paraben free,sulfate free,gluten free', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'HASK', 'Hair Type': 'All, Oily, Color Treated, Dry', 'Product Dimensions': '2.13 x 4.38 x 7.6 inches; 1.71 Pounds', 'Item model number': '38146A', 'UPC': '071164381465'}
Review Text: Love love love!  the scent is delicate, and delightful.  My hair is left feeling soft, bouncy, and knot/fly-away free!  I am very happy I found this!
Review Title: Perfect for fine wavy hair
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details:

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:  
The user has expressed satisfaction with various skincare and haircare products. They particularly appreciated the gentle and effective cleansing properties of the exfoliant, noting a soft and vibrant skin feel. In haircare, the user enjoyed pleasant scents and effective moisturizing benefits that left hair clean, soft, and without tangles. Additionally, both the consistency and application of products received positive remarks, with several reviews highlighting ease of use and immediate results like shine and bounce in hair. Overall, the user had enjoyable experiences with the pleasant fragrances and beneficial effects of the products, influencing their overall satisfaction.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:  
Despite several positive experiences, the user encountered a few disappointments. Initial expectations were not met with one scrub due to its small container size, leading to concerns about longevity despite its efficacy. Additionally, there was mention of a particularly sweet scent in one haircare product that did not align with their personal taste. The varied product ratings suggest a lack of consistency in meeting expectations, with certain items falling short of providing a satisfactory experience when compared to others.

OVERALL SUMMARY:  
The user’s purchase history reflects a blend of positive and negative experiences with skincare and haircare products. They praised several items for their effectiveness, pleasant scents, and ease of application, often leading to satisfying results such as improved skin texture and clean, manageable hair. However, there were instances of disappointment related to product sizes and fragrance preferences that did not resonate. Overall, while there were standout products that contributed to a positive experience, some inconsistencies in product satisfaction indicate room for improvement in future purchases.

target_interaction.title: excellent product, but don't allow cream to sit too long!
target_interaction.text: the depilatory cream really works!  The smell is somewhat unpleasant, but certainly intolerable. I am just happy that it works as advertised.  I will warn you to be careful, though.  I ended up with some very dry skin on my leg from this cream.  It heeled, so that makes me happy.  As for the inhibitor... It kind of works... it at least slows down the growth of the hair, and wen the hair returns the roots are considerably more fragile.  very pleased!
target_interaction.title_meta: Hair Removal Cream and Inhibitor, Depilatory Cream Hair Inhibiting, Skin Friendly Painless Flawless Hair Remover Cream For Women and Men, Airassi
